text: Egha gɨn Livaiba uari uari bagha asɨzir tuziba tua egha ofa gamir gumaziba bagha uaghan maba tue, me Aronɨn ovavir boriba. Ofa gamir gumaziba ofan bar isia mɨghɨriba bagha bar ingangarir ekiam gamua, dar ovibar ofa gamua zuima amɨnim pɨri. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me uari uari bagha asɨzir tuzitaba tuezir puvatɨ.
